name: The Corridor (itch) (DivideByZero)
description:
An unknown person offered a large sum of money for you to sweep his house. Of course you accept the offer. But he adds a comment "You can hide in the closets". Why? What's inside the house that would make you hide in the closet? Looks like you're going to figure that out by yourself...

The game was made for the BRACKEYS 2022.2 GameJam. Its is my first ever game jam and if you played the game please leave a comment or tips to help make my games better.

Controls : WASD to move , Hold F to Clean Floors , E to interact.
